title: Provenance data model based on HL7 equivalent resource

resourceType.description: Property. Model:'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/agaldemas/incubated/master/SMART%20HEALTH/HL7/' This is a Provenance resource

meta.description: Property. Model:'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/agaldemas/incubated/master/SMART%20HEALTH/HL7/Meta' The metadata about a resource. This is content in the resource that is maintained by the infrastructure. Changes to the content might not always be associated with version changes to the resource.

implicitRules.description: Property. Model:'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/agaldemas/incubated/master/SMART%20HEALTH/HL7/uri' String of characters used to identify a name or a resource

_implicitRules.description: Property. Model:'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/agaldemas/incubated/master/SMART%20HEALTH/HL7/Element' Base definition for all elements in a resource.

language.description: Property. Model:'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/agaldemas/incubated/master/SMART%20HEALTH/HL7/code' A string which has at least one character and no leading or trailing whitespace and where there is no whitespace other than single spaces in the contents

_language.description: Property. Model:'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/agaldemas/incubated/master/SMART%20HEALTH/HL7/Element' Base definition for all elements in a resource.

text.description: Property. Model:'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/agaldemas/incubated/master/SMART%20HEALTH/HL7/Narrative' A human-readable summary of the resource conveying the essential clinical and business information for the resource.

contained.description: Property. Model:'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/agaldemas/incubated/master/SMART%20HEALTH/HL7/ResourceList' These resources do not have an independent existence apart from the resource that contains them - they cannot be identified independently, and nor can they have their own independent transaction scope.

extension.description: Relationship. Model:'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/agaldemas/incubated/master/SMART%20HEALTH/HL7/Extension' Optional Extension Element - found in all resources.

anyOf.description: Property. Identifier format of any NGSI entity
Property. Identifier format of any NGSI entity

modifierExtension.description: Relationship. Model:'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/agaldemas/incubated/master/SMART%20HEALTH/HL7/Extension' Optional Extension Element - found in all resources.

anyOf.description: Property. Identifier format of any NGSI entity
Property. Identifier format of any NGSI entity

target.description: Property. Model:'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/agaldemas/incubated/master/SMART%20HEALTH/HL7/Reference' A reference from one resource to another.

occurredPeriod.description: Property. Model:'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/agaldemas/incubated/master/SMART%20HEALTH/HL7/Period' A time period defined by a start and end date and optionally time.

occurredDateTime.description: Property. Model:'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/agaldemas/incubated/master/SMART%20HEALTH/HL7/' The period during which the activity occurred.

_occurredDateTime.description: Property. Model:'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/agaldemas/incubated/master/SMART%20HEALTH/HL7/Element' Base definition for all elements in a resource.

recorded.description: Property. Model:'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/agaldemas/incubated/master/SMART%20HEALTH/HL7/instant' An instant in time - known at least to the second

_recorded.description: Property. Model:'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/agaldemas/incubated/master/SMART%20HEALTH/HL7/Element' Base definition for all elements in a resource.

policy.description: Property. Model:'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/agaldemas/incubated/master/SMART%20HEALTH/HL7/uri' String of characters used to identify a name or a resource

_policy.description: Property. Model:'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/agaldemas/incubated/master/SMART%20HEALTH/HL7/Element' Base definition for all elements in a resource.

location.description: Property. Model:'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/agaldemas/incubated/master/SMART%20HEALTH/HL7/Reference' A reference from one resource to another.

reason.description: Property. Model:'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/agaldemas/incubated/master/SMART%20HEALTH/HL7/CodeableConcept' A concept that may be defined by a formal reference to a terminology or ontology or may be provided by text.

activity.description: Property. Model:'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/agaldemas/incubated/master/SMART%20HEALTH/HL7/CodeableConcept' A concept that may be defined by a formal reference to a terminology or ontology or may be provided by text.

agent.description: Property. Model:'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/agaldemas/incubated/master/SMART%20HEALTH/HL7/Provenance_Agent' Provenance of a resource is a record that describes entities and processes involved in producing and delivering or otherwise influencing that resource. Provenance provides a critical foundation for assessing authenticity, enabling trust, and allowing reproducibility. Provenance assertions are a form of contextual metadata and can themselves become important records with their own provenance. Provenance statement indicates clinical significance in terms of confidence in authenticity, reliability, and trustworthiness, integrity, and stage in lifecycle (e.g. Document Completion - has the artifact been legally authenticated), all of which may impact security, privacy, and trust policies.

entity.description: Property. Model:'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/agaldemas/incubated/master/SMART%20HEALTH/HL7/Provenance_Entity' Provenance of a resource is a record that describes entities and processes involved in producing and delivering or otherwise influencing that resource. Provenance provides a critical foundation for assessing authenticity, enabling trust, and allowing reproducibility. Provenance assertions are a form of contextual metadata and can themselves become important records with their own provenance. Provenance statement indicates clinical significance in terms of confidence in authenticity, reliability, and trustworthiness, integrity, and stage in lifecycle (e.g. Document Completion - has the artifact been legally authenticated), all of which may impact security, privacy, and trust policies.

signature.description: Property. Model:'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/agaldemas/incubated/master/SMART%20HEALTH/HL7/Signature' A signature along with supporting context. The signature may be a digital signature that is cryptographic in nature, or some other signature acceptable to the domain. This other signature may be as simple as a graphical image representing a hand-written signature, or a signature ceremony Different signature approaches have different utilities.

type.description: Property. NGSI Entity type. It has to be 'Provenance'
